dialogue.introduction: I'm Seaplane Tender Akitsushima! Make sure to remember me along with this Taitei-chan, alright!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm the Seaplane Tender Akitsushima! That's right, I'm a Flying Boat Tender constructed for the sake of assisting Large-sized Flying Boat and refueling at sea, among other things! Eh? Is my "makeup" too heavy? You're rude, maybe! I'm not letting you have Type 2 Taitei-chan, kay!
dialogue.secretary2: This Type 2 Taitei-chan? I'm not letting you have her.
dialogue.secretary3: Heeey! Admiral, I hope you will not touch places that had nothing to do with you so much, maybe! Taitei-chan can't sleep like this, right!
dialogue.secretaryidle: This camouflage is flashy isn't it? Nah, that's not true, don't you agree, Taitei-chan? Don't you think so? Taitei-chan thinks so too, don't you? Ah, Admiral, is it time for our next mission?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, why are you so lost in thought? Ah, are you tired? Times like these, the Akitsushima-style shoulder massage technique will be... Ufufu, hey, feels good doesn't it?
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, you called me here? I'm not giving you Taitei-chan if it's about her. Eh, that's not it? Ugh...this is... wow... it's beautiful... amaaazing... so, why are giving it to me?
dialogue.show_players_score: You wanna see the report? That's important, maybe. Here, help yourself.
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Flying Boat Tender Akitsushima, setting sail, maybe! Wait that's not it, setting sail!
dialogue.equipment1: Whoa, such good equipment! I'm happy, I think!
dialogue.equipment2: Admiral, you can't separate Type 2 Taitei-chan from me, maybe! I'm telling you!
dialogue.supply: Supply, this helps, I think... Ehehe
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Uuu... my defenses might be on the low side, I think... I'll have a bath, maybe...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: They got me good, I think-.. I'm not meant for the front line, maybe. Logistics might be perfect for me I think..
dialogue.ship_construction: Somebody said a new ship girl has come! Who is she? Who is she?
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Operation complete! The fleet has returned I think!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Now's the time, Akitsushima-style combat navigation technique, maybe I'll do it in a real battle!
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy fleet, sighted, I think! All fleet, prepare for battle!
dialogue.air_battle: Do you say I wear heavy makeup? It's so rude!
dialogue.attack: Attack power, I might be low on that, I think...
dialogue.night_battle: N-Night battle!? Me? W-well, I guess I have no choice but to go, I think...
dialogue.night_attack: Do you say I wear heavy makeup? It's so rude!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Do you say I wear heavy makeup? It's so rude!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Do you say I wear heavy makeup? It's so rude!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Do you say I wear heavy makeup? It's so rude!
dialogue.mvp: E-Eh! I'm number one!? Is such a thing even possible... Eh...
dialogue.minor_damaged2: My camouflage pattern, might not have been very useful I think...
dialogue.moderately_damaged: T-..They got me good, I think. That's why I told you offense is not one of my fortes...
dialogue.sunk: I see, I'm sinking... Taitei-chan, bye, bye. I'm sure the future will be...
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Admiral, the rainy season is a bit unpleasant, isn't it? Taitei-chan might be troubled too... I wonder if I should make a teru teru bozu.
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Hey! It's almost summer! I have to swim with Taitei-chan! Admiral, you're coming too? I'm looking forward to it!
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Yay! Summer has arrived kamo! Admiral, come on, come on, hurry up and change into your swimsuit, let's go swimming! I'll even let you hold on to Taitei-chan, just this once!
dialogue.fall_2015: Autumn, huh... I don't really like autumn. I get weirdly anxious about the sky and stuff. Isn't that right, Taitei-chan?
dialogue.christmas_2015: All right! It's Christmas! I'll go make a lot of dishes, I think! Huh? Zuikaku? What's wrong?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Waaa, it's spring cleaning, maybe~ It's the end-of-the-year Akitsushima's spring cleaning! I've to polish up the crane and others. It's alright, Taitei-chan, don't worry.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, Happy New Year! Take care of Taitei-chan and me this year too.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's Setsubun, huh. Throwing these beans... I see. Who we'll be throw them at is a sensitive question, kamo. ...Choukai? No way. There's something wrong with that, kamo.

hourly.0000: Admiral, the date might have changed! Today I, Akitsushima will be your secretary, maybe. Ok?
hourly.0100: 0100. Is it fine like this? It might be fine? Okay!
hourly.0200: 0200. Maybe I've a knack for this. Aren't I the perfect secretary?
hourly.0300: 03...0...0. But I might be a bit drowsy. It's this late, after all.
hourly.0400: 04...00... Eh, I'm ok. I'm perfectly awake... maybe...
hourly.0500: Oh no! I'm awake! 0500! It might already be morning! I need to get it together!
hourly.0600: 0600. Admiral, what would be good for breakfast? You know, I'm unexpectedly good at cooking!
hourly.0700: 0700. Admiral, have some breakfast, maybe! Look, this miso soup for example... isn't it good? There's also some dried fish!
hourly.0800: 0800. Alright, once we're done with cleaning up, we should hurry and put the flying boat to use! We might have a long-distance recon expedition!?
hourly.0900: 0900. Taitei-chan? Heh, cute right? But no matter how much you praise her, I won't give her to you.
hourly.1000: 1000. Admiral, what will you do next? Maybe check as many missions as you can?
hourly.1100: 1100. Alright, we have to prepare for lunch. If it's lunch, then it should be curry after all, maybe. Is curry fine with you?
hourly.1200: 1200. Tadaa! It's Akitsushima's deluxe curry! It's definitely good, maybe! Try some, try some!
hourly.1300: 1300. How was it? Akitsushima's curry. I have an unexpectedly large food warehouse. Ehehe.
hourly.1400: 1400. As expected, this camouflage might be strange? Really? I rather like it though...
hourly.1500: 1500. Admiral, are you maybe getting hungry? I made some food like Inari-zushi but, will you maybe take some?
hourly.1600: 1600. It might be sunset soon for today as well. Ahh, I might be tired.
hourly.1700: 1700. It might be dusk. Taitei-chan, too, good work today. Afuun.
hourly.1800: 1800. Alright, I shall prepare for dinner, maybe. Admiral, is there something you'd like to eat?
hourly.1900: 1900. Here, tonight I've tried to make my deluxe cabbage roll, maybe. The plentiful potatos and onions are the main point of the flavor!
hourly.2000: 2000. Admiral, how was the cabbage roll? It tasted a bit like a croquette and was delicious, right? Yep, yep. Thank goodness, maybe!
hourly.2100: 2100. Alright! It'll be the end of the day once I've done the dishes. I might be tired!
hourly.2200: 2200. Oh, somehow it's noisy from the direction of the torpedo squadron even though it's nighttime, maybe. Eh? It can't be helped? I see, so that's how it is.
hourly.2300: 2300. Admiral, thanks for your hard work today, maybe. Let's do our best tomorrow too.
